CssData.name: REACT
CssData.info: React is the library for web and native user interfaces. Build user interfaces out of individual pieces called components written in JavaScript.

CssData.name: NODEJS
CssData.info: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment. Node.js runs on the V8 JavaScript engine, and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

CssData.name: Nextjs
CssData.info: 1Next.js is a React-based, open-source web development framework that enables React-based web applications
